title: Sonoma
name: Carneros Bistro & Wine Bar
content: Located in a hotel, the menu designed by Chef Andrew makes this a popular place. It's the only Renaissance Hotel restaurant in the country that sustains itself without support from the hotel. Steaks, seafood, pasta and seasonal dishes with a great wine list available. The bar, where they serve a cheaper bar menu with wood-fired pizzas, is popular with locals and tourists alike. They also have an outdoor patio but the view isn't much to mention.
